name: RELEASE_THIS_AS
description:
If you set this field, this will be used as next release version. Both NEXT_SNAPSHOT_AS and INCREMENT_FIELD settings will be ignored. The next snapshot version will be calculated from the released version. 

Format: "x.y.z", where all of "x' and "y" and "z" are positive integers. Please be very careful with this, because the versioning can go terribly wrong if you make a mistake here.

Example:
RELEASE_THIS_AS: 1.0.0
The next snapshot will be 1.0.1-SNAPSHOT regardless of NEXT_SNAPSHOT_AS and INCREMENT_FIELD settings.

If you leave it blank, then it is not used, and the pipeline will check if NEXT_SNAPSHOT_AS is set or not.
